MEGA Normal map pack

25 Mar 2019 | textures set

This set of normal maps will help you with texturing as well as creating a variety of interesting surfaces. Each texture is seamless and has an alpha option for importing, for example, into Substance Painter. You can also use it for other different programs. Textures have a resolution of 2k.

Read more

TWS headphones

13 Mar 2019 | 3D-models other

Model of TWS headphones. All texture sets (Unity, Unreal Engine, PBR) are also available. All models have lods (2-3 levels).
